channel.title: Plan on Plan Do Check
channel.description: Recent content in Plan on Plan Do Check

item.title: Plan
item.description: Planning Phase (Steps 1 -6) Step 1: Assessing Problems and Resources - Identify and select priority problems for your prevention activity. - Understand the available resources. Step 2: Setting Goals and Desired Outcomes - Define a vision, goals, and specific outcomes for your prevention activity. Step 3: Evidence -Based and Promising Practices - Select prevention activities with evidence of effectiveness. Step 4: Assessing Fit for a Prevention Activity - Evaluate how well selected activities fit the target population, community, and mission.
